page.title: 01Bracknell New Town
page.content: The development of Bracknell New Town was begun in{1949.}It was built to provide jobs and homes for people coming from London and was chosen for its good,flat,building land and nearness to the city.50,000 people now live in the town.Many companies have built factories and headquarters in the three industrial areas which are the Eastern,Western,and Southern. Several are large high technology firms.The Meteorological office and R.A.F. Staff College are also based here.The people live in 9 housing areas which have primary schools,small shops,pubs and a lot of open space.The town centre is a pedestrian precinct with good shopping facilities.Leisure facilities include a Sports Centre and the South Hill Park Arts Centre with the new Wilde Theatre.
